response.original_title: The Descendant of the Snow Leopard
response.overview: Set in the remote Kyrgyz mountains, The Descendant of the Snow Leopard tells the story of a resilient nomadic tribe whose survival and spiritual identity are deeply connected to the elusive snow leopard. Based on a traditional Kyrgyz folktale, the film explores themes of courage, heritage, and humanityâ€™s bond with nature, as one family confronts harsh environments, moral dilemmas, and cultural transformation in Soviet-era Central Asia.
response.title: The Descendant of the Snow Leopard
